definitions.definition: A brief fall of precipitation (spell of rain, or a similar fall of snow, sleet, or cascade).
definitions.example: Today there will be frequent showers and some sunny spells.

definitions.definition: A device for bathing by which water is made to fall on the body from a height, either from a tank or by the action of a pump.
An instance of using of this device in order to bathe oneself.
definitions.example: I′m going to have a shower.

definitions.definition: A quantity of something that has characteristics of a rain shower.
definitions.example: a shower of sparks;  a meteor shower;  a Gatorade shower

definitions.definition: A party associated with a significant event in a person's life, at which the person usually receives gifts.
definitions.example: Her church group has planned an adoption shower.

definitions.definition: (with of and an invective) Used as an intensifying pluralizer or intensifier
(followed by with) To spray with (a specified liquid).
To bestow liberally, to give or distribute in abundance
To rain in a shower; to cascade down.
Some object or activity that is shown in a contest
definitions.example: That calf is going to be a great shower at the fair this year.

definitions.definition: A man whose penis appears roughly full size both when flaccid and when erect.
